description.zh: TrendRadar 是一款轻量级开源热点监控工具，聚合多个平台的热门资讯，并提供个性化、实时的信息推送。用户可通过自定义关键词过滤内容，分析趋势变化，并通过多种渠道接收智能通知。项目设计注重易用性，支持在 GitHub 上一键部署，无需编程基础。
description.en: TrendRadar is a lightweight, open-source hotspot monitoring tool that aggregates trending news from multiple platforms and delivers personalized, real-time updates. It enables users to filter content by custom keywords, analyze trends over time, and receive intelligent notifications via multiple channels. Designed for ease of deployment, it supports one-click setup on GitHub with no coding required.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 零技术门槛，GitHub 一键 Fork 即可使用
- 通过精准过滤减少信息过载，只关注真正相关的热点
- 支持多通道推送，实现实时手机和邮件提醒
- 提供基于 AI 的自然语言对话式新闻趋势分析
- 轻量且可自托管，降低对算法推荐 App 的依赖

## 功能列表:

- 聚合微博、知乎、百度、B站等 11+ 平台热点
- 三种推送模式：每日汇总、当前排名、增量监控
- 智能关键词过滤，支持必含词(+)和排除词(!)
- 推送时间窗口控制，避免非工作时间打扰
- 实时趋势追踪，包含生命周期、热度变化和新话题识别
- 跨平台新闻排名对比，分析媒体关注度差异
- 可配置的个性化排序算法（排名、频率、热度权重）
- 多通道通知：企业微信、飞书、钉钉、Telegram、邮箱、ntfy
- 集成 GitHub Pages 生成适配移动端的网页报告
- 基于 MCP 的 AI 分析服务，支持自然语言查询和 13 种分析工具
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Zero technical barrier deployment with one-click fork on GitHub
- Reduces information overload by filtering only relevant hotspots
- Supports multi-channel push for real-time mobile and email alerts
- Enables AI-powered conversational analysis of news trends
- Lightweight and self-hosted, reducing dependency on algorithm-driven apps

## Features:

- Aggregates hotspots from 11+ platforms including Weibo, Zhihu, Baidu, and Bilibili
- Three push modes: daily summary, current ranking, and incremental monitoring
- Smart keyword filtering with support for required (+) and filter (!) words
- Time window control for scheduled, non-disruptive notifications
- Real-time trend tracking with lifecycle, popularity changes, and new topic detection
- Cross-platform comparison of news rankings and media attention
- Personalized ranking algorithm (configurable weight for rank, frequency, and heat)
- Multi-channel notification support: WeCom, Feishu, DingTalk, Telegram, Email, ntfy
- GitHub Pages integration for web-based reports with mobile adaptation
- AI analysis server based on MCP with natural language querying and 13 analytical tools
